title: Western Australia
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Western Australia - Description and travel
description: Episode of Series "Holiday". Experience the highlights of Western Australia beginning with the wildlife and good food at Margaret River, visit the Pinnacles, enjoy a range of sporting activities at Merribrook, join a cattle muster at El Questro or a novelty gypsy caravan tour, explore the Spanish architecture at New Norcia - the country town built to bring christianity to the Aborigines, visit the Pilbara and picturesque Broome or board a yacht to explore remote sections of Western Australia's spectacular coastline.
